scripts.build:login: cd bukipin-login-seamless && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && rm -rf public/login && mkdir -p public/login && cp -r bukipin-login-seamless/dist/* public/login
scripts.build:dashboard: cd bukipin-dashboard && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && rm -rf public/dashboard && mkdir -p public/dashboard && cp -r bukipin-dashboard/dist/* public/dashboard
scripts.build: npm run build:login && npm run build:dashboard
scripts.bootstrap: npm install --prefix bukipin-login-seamless && npm install --prefix bukipin-dashboard
